page.title: 19Kilsby and Barby Chess Club
page.content:
The Kilsby and Barby Chess Club meets every Monday. It is for school children but anyone would be welcome. Mr.Hatton is the organiser.
Mr.Hatton teaches the beginners. The better children sometimes play tournaments or try to solve puzzles.
Sometimes matches are organised against other clubs, usually Bilton or Braunston. Several of the children in the club have been selected to play for the county.
Chess in our area is very strong and is likely to improve with the starting of a new schools' Chess league!
